ch0142_00_athena/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, I thought you might show up,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0142_00_athena/0101_0701_02_10:
*chuckle* Today’s the day I teach you just how
wonderful Team Rocket is!
ch0142_00_athena/7101_0701_01_10:
You’d better think twice about opposing
Team Rocket.
ch0142_00_athena/7101_0701_02_10:
We’re not an organization that a child like
you can do anything about.
ch0142_00_athena/7101_0701_03_10:
For your own sake, it’d be best to just stay quiet
and do what you’re told. *chuckle*
ch0142_00_athena/7102_0701_01_10:
I didn’t realize the dragon master with the
cape was here on Pasio...
ch0142_00_athena/7102_0701_02_10:
Even though there are tons of valuable Pokémon
around, there are too many annoying Trainers!
ch0142_00_athena/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m sure you’re dying to know what Giovanni
plans to do once he’s taken over Pasio.
ch0142_00_athena/7103_0701_02_10:
All people and Pokémon will pledge their loyalty
to Giovanni and work for Team Rocket!
ch0142_00_athena/7104_0701_01_10:
Famous people gather here on Pasio. I think
we could take advantage of that.
ch0142_00_athena/7104_0701_02_10: If we forcibly bend them to our will...
ch0142_00_athena/7104_0701_03_10:
then word will spread, and the world will
know Team Rocket’s true power!
ch0142_00_athena/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. You’ve been doing
quite well lately, haven’t you?
ch0142_00_athena/7105_0701_02_10:
What a waste, not using your strength to do
bad things!
ch0142_00_athena/7105_0701_03_10:
If you ever change your mind, Team Rocket will be
more than happy to welcome you into our fold.
ch0142_00_athena/7105_0701_04_10: Not that I expect you to join. But it’s an option.
ch0142_00_athena/1701_0702_01_10: Are you curious why I gave you a gift?
ch0142_00_athena/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m letting Archer take the number-two spot in
Team Rocket right now, but I haven’t given up.
ch0142_00_athena/2501_0701_02_10: One day, I’ll take that spot next to Giovanni!
ch0142_00_athena/2501_0701_03_10:
There would be no greater joy than working for
Giovanni as his highest-ranking executive!
ch0142_00_athena/2501_0702_01_10: Team Rocket’s ideals are Giovanni’s ideals.
ch0142_00_athena/2501_0702_02_10:
I’m prepared to devote everything I have
to Giovanni.
ch0142_00_athena/2511_0701_01_10: Where does that strength of yours come from?
ch0142_00_athena/2511_0701_02_10:
Does it stem from wanting to protect the people
and Pokémon around you?
ch0142_00_athena/2511_0701_03_10:
Usually I’d point out how foolish that is, but I
can’t say it’s wrong.
ch0142_00_athena/2511_0701_04_10:
After all, I work because I want to be useful to
Giovanni.
ch0142_00_athena/2511_0702_01_10:
You want to know why I do so much to support
Giovanni?
ch0142_00_athena/2511_0702_02_10:
I don’t think we’re close enough for me to
divulge that...
ch0142_00_athena/2511_0702_03_10:
But if you can surpass him as an evil mastermind,
I may reconsider.
ch0142_00_athena/3001_0701_01_10:
You look like you’re still a little sleepy. Don’t let
any bad people trick you while you’re spacing out!
ch0142_00_athena/3003_0701_01_10:
Villains aren’t made in a day. A good villain must
always be ready to do bad deeds!
ch0142_00_athena/3005_0701_01_10:
Morning and afternoon mean nothing to Team
Rocket! Bad deeds can be done whenever the
opportunity arises!
